channel.title: Need help getting my server online [Exion based]
channel.description:
i downloaded a client and server based on Exion [PI] but i can't get my server online, i portforwarded correctly (all server status checkers and port checkers say i did) when i put my IP on a status checker is says: ONLINE but no-one can login except me, also the moparscape webclient won't let people join my server the IP of my server = 77.165.89.36 Port = 43594 i also set-up No-Ip but nothing seems to work please can someone help? I REALLY DON'T WANT TO USE HAMACHI!
EDIT: i did change the IP in the server to: 77.165.89.36 (maybe i did it wrong?)

item.title: Need help getting my server online [Exion based]
item.dc:creator: @quintensky quintensky
item.description:
@quintensky wrote:

i downloaded a client and server based on Exion [PI]
but i can’t get my server online, i portforwarded correctly
(all server status checkers and port checkers say i did)
when i put my IP on a status checker is says: ONLINE
but no-one can login except me, also the moparscape webclient won’t let people join my server
the IP of my server = 77.165.89.36 Port = 43594
i also set-up No-Ip but nothing seems to work
please can someone help?
I REALLY DON’T WANT TO USE HAMACHI!

EDIT: i did change the IP in the server to: 77.165.89.36 (maybe i did it wrong?)
